<h1> weathers </h1>
<p> every other weather npm was tragic so I rolled my own [its so simple]</p>

<pre>
  <code>
    npm install weathers

    --

    var weathers = require('weathers');

    weather.getWeather(lat, lng, function(err, data){
     ~~ do awesome stuff! ~~
    });
  </code>
</pre>

###### Sample Response
